description:
A categorization reflecting the fundamental form of communication in which the content is expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be perceived.

Version: 1.0.0

1001.label: cartographic dataset
1001.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through a digitally encoded dataset intended to be processed by a computer.

1002.label: cartographic image
1002.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through line, shape, shading, etc., intended to be perceived visually as a still image or images in two dimensions.

1003.label: cartographic moving image
1003.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through images intended to be perceived as moving, in two dimensions.

1004.label: cartographic tactile image
1004.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through line, shape, and/or other forms, intended to be perceived through touch as a still image in two dimensions.

1005.label: cartographic tactile three-dimensional form
1005.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through a form or forms intended to be perceived through touch as a three-dimensional form or forms.

1006.label: cartographic three-dimensional form
1006.description: A content type that consists of cartographic content expressed through a form or forms intended to be perceived visually in three-dimensions.

1007.label: computer dataset
1007.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a digitally encoded dataset intended to be processed by a computer.

1008.label: computer program
1008.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through digitally encoded instructions intended to be processed and performed by a computer.

1009.label: notated movement
1009.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of notation for movement intended to be perceived visually.

1010.label: notated music
1010.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of musical notation intended to be perceived visually.

1011.label: performed music
1011.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through music in an audible form.

1012.label: sounds
1012.description: A content type that consists of content other than language or music, expressed in an audible form.

1013.label: spoken word
1013.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through language in an audible form.

1014.label: still image
1014.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through line, shape, shading, etc., intended to be perceived visually as a still image or images in two dimensions.

1015.label: tactile image
1015.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through line, shape, and/or other forms, intended to be perceived through touch as a still image in two dimensions.

1016.label: tactile notated music
1016.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of musical notation intended to be perceived through touch.

1017.label: tactile notated movement
1017.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of notation for movement intended to be perceived through touch.

1018.label: tactile text
1018.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of notation for language intended to be perceived through touch.

1019.label: tactile three-dimensional form
1019.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form or forms intended to be perceived through touch as a three-dimensional form or forms.

1020.label: text
1020.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form of notation for language intended to be perceived visually.

1021.label: three-dimensional form
1021.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through a form or forms intended to be perceived visually in three-dimensions.

1022.label: three-dimensional moving image
1022.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through images intended to be perceived to be moving, and in three dimensions.

1023.label: two-dimensional moving image
1023.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through images intended to be perceived to be moving, and in two dimensions.

1024.label: performed movement
1024.description: A content type that consists of content expressed through choreography in a visual form.
